issue.title: [Format] Interval type is not documented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3097](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3097). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
All types except Interval are documented in Metadata.md. Information about Interval is missing, in particular what is its size (64 bit?) and what is the meaning of IntervalUnit values.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3097?focusedCommentId=16586316) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
[~k.shaposhnikov@gmail.com] the Interval type is not yet fully specified. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-352. Also see discussion in

https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Columnar+Format+1.0+Milestone#ColumnarFormat1.0Milestone-Interval/Timedelta
